pages.text: $(blood)[Wrince, please pretty up these notes and remove duplicate info from Crystallized Will.]$() $(li)Chunk-based. $(li)Holds up to 100 of each Will Aspect. $(li)Demon Crucible removes Will from Tartaric Gems, or consumes Demon Will Crsytals (50 Will per crystal) and puts it into the Aura. $(li)Hellfire Forge takes Will from Aura and puts it into the contained Tartaric Gem.

pages.heading: Demon Crucible
pages.text: $(li)This Hellfire Forge mechanic is how you get Aspected Tartaric Gems. $(li)Ritual Augments use Will from the Aura.
